## Session Structure

Each session follows this format:

| Segment | Duration | Activity |
|---------|----------|----------|
| Welcome & Review | 10 min | Recap previous session |
| Presentation | 30 min | Core concepts & demos |
| Hands-on Exercise | 40 min | Guided practice |
| Lab Work | 30 min | Independent project |
| Q&A & Wrap-up | 10 min | Questions & preview |

---

## Quick Start

### For Instructors
1. Review the [Instructor Guide](resources/instructor/INSTRUCTOR-GUIDE.md)
2. Prepare slides from [presentation-templates/](presentation-templates/)
3. Set up lab environments per [Setup Guide](templates/README.md)
4. Review answer keys in [resources/instructor/answer-keys/](resources/instructor/answer-keys/)

### For Students
1. Review the [SYLLABUS.md](SYLLABUS.md) for complete course details
2. Complete pre-course setup per [Getting Started](GETTING-STARTED.md)
3. Attend all {{SESSION_COUNT}} sessions
4. Complete exercises and labs for each module
5. Submit final capstone project

---

## Assessment & Certification

### Grading Components

| Component | Weight | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Quizzes | 15% | End-of-module knowledge checks |
| Labs & Exercises | 25% | Hands-on practice work |
| Participation | 10% | Class engagement |
| Final Capstone | 40% | Comprehensive project |
| Presentation | 10% | Capstone demo & defense |

### Certification Requirements

- Attend minimum 80% of sessions
- Complete all module labs
- Score 70%+ on all quizzes
- Submit and present capstone project
- Achieve overall score of 70%+
